title: "Should We Create An ‘Island’ For God-Like Artificial Intelligence?"
excerpt: "A recent Financial Times column called for creating an \"island\" around new artificial intelligence research. AI safety is an important issue, but before implementing such a dramatic proposal, we should get a better hand of the problem we face and the potential solutions first."
